mage.name: Mage
mage.description: She is a skilled wizard who has special skills in using spells.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.description: He is a thief and most of his abilities are in stealing from the enemy!

warlock.name: Warlock
warlock.description: You will never see anyone beyond him. He passes on his life and property and sacrifices something to win the war.

availableCardsWithThisSituation.name: CurioCollector
availableCardsWithThisSituation.description: Whenever you draw a card, gain +1/+1.

availableCardsWithThisSituation.name: Sathrovarr
availableCardsWithThisSituation.description: Choose a friendly minion. Add a copy of it to your hand, deck and battlefield.

availableCardsWithThisSituation.name: SecurityRover
availableCardsWithThisSituation.description: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/3 Mech with Taunt.

availableCardsWithThisSituation.name: TombWarden
availableCardsWithThisSituation.description: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.

availableCardsWithThisSituation.name: BookOfSpecters
availableCardsWithThisSituation.description: Draw 3 cards. Discard any spells drawn.

availableCardsWithThisSituation.name: PharaohsBlessing
availableCardsWithThisSituation.description: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.

availableCardsWithThisSituation.name: Polymorph
availableCardsWithThisSituation.description: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep.
